name: Platform Souls
description:
CONTROLS:  

-Mouse for camera controls (strongly preferred over touchpad)
-Left click and hold to grapple / release to ungrappable
-WASD
-H key goes to main menu for level selection
-Spacebar to jump or hit twice to double jump

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made using Unity 2019.2.17.f1 by Punit Munnangi and Rolando G Hernandez.

Prototype game (demo) for Computer Game Science capstone project from Oct 2020 - March 2021.  

Gameplay focuses on level design, gameplay "feel", and player mechanics.

Work in progress.
